msbt.message: Remember when I said I was thinking about leaving? Well, I decided to stay. I ended up having a chat with about it, and I stopped worrying.I mean, you and I still haven't figured out who's tougher yetand that's just unsettling.

I know I talked to you about me leaving the island, but I just couldn't go through with it. I had a heart-to-heart chat with and we decided that I'm needed here. I bet you thought you were going to be able to take it easy, !

Remember how I was thinking about leaving a while back? Well, chuck that idea. After talking to you, I had a chat with , andit helped me see that this place is home. I'm right where I'm supposed to be, so you'd better get used to me and my muscles, .

Remember when I talked with you the other day about leaving the island? Yeah, I scrapped that idea. After our chat, I started thinking about it, and I just don't have the heart to leave this place. I mean, we still need to figure out which of us is tougher. So get used to seeing a lot more of me!
